<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get new access token"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/authentication/token"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



You will need to authorize the API to access your BTG Pactual account.
The authorization flow follows the JSON Web Token (JWT) for OAuth 2.0 Client Authentication standard, to ensure security while allowing you full access to your own account.

Every access token is valid for 20 minutes, after which you can request a new one.

Sample request:

    POST /Token
     Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
     client_id=[YourClientId]&client_secret=[YourSecret]&grant_type=client_credentials

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"required":["client_id","client_secret","grant_type"],"properties":{"client_id":{"description":"Client Id","type":"string"},"client_secret":{"description":"Client secret key","type":"string"},"grant_type":{"description":"OAuth2 grant type (This endpoint allow only 'client_credentials')","default":"client_credentials","type":"string"}},"description":"","type":"object","example":"client_id=[YourClientId]&client_secret=[YourSecret]&grant_type=client_credentials","title":"OauthTokenRequest"},"examples":{"Default":{"value":"client_id=[YourClientId]&client_secret=[YourSecret]&grant_type=client_credentials"}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["access_token","expires_in","token_type"],"properties":{"token_type":{"description":"\"bearer\" means that this token is valid to access the API by Authorization Http Header","type":"string"},"expires_in":{"format":"int32","description":"Token expiration time in seconds","type":"integer"},"access_token":{"description":"The access token","type":"string"}},"type":"object","example":{"token_type":"Bearer","expires_in":1200,"access_token":"[JWT Access Token]"},"title":"AuthToken"}}},"description":"Success"},"400":{"description":"Bad request (Invalid credentials or 'grant_type' invalid)"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized (Invalid credentials)"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden (Credentials Locked)"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
